price.s1: Transfer from the new airport Istanbul / to the new airport Istanbul to the Black Sea and ski resorts in Bulgaria
price.u1: We also provide transfer service from/to Sabiha Gökçen Airport, Istanbul SAW. Due to the remoteness of this airport and the traffic congestion in Istanbul the cost of the trip will increase by 50 € compared to the cost of the transfer to the new airport Istanbul.
price.u2: Transfer from Burgas airport / to Burgas airport to the Black Sea and ski resorts in Bulgaria

question.1: How to order a transfer service?
question.2: What if the flight is delayed?
question.3: In what currency is payment possible and when?
question.4: How can I cancel a transfer?
question.5: How do I find a driver at the airport?

answer.1: To order a transfer service, fill out an application on the site, or call / write us on WhatsApp, Telegram, Viber.
answer.2: If the application contains a flight number, there is no need to worry. We keep track of our customers' flights and we will meet you.
answer.3: You can pay the driver in euros or other currency (as agreed) after the trip.
answer.4: You can cancel your trip by sending a message of cancellation to WhatsApp, Telegram, Viber no later than 12 hours before your arrival.
answer.5: When you confirm the trip, you will be given contact with the driver, with whom you will discuss all the details of the meeting and the trip.
